title: Clovis Goods 20S0301-72, 72 x 36 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)
item_description:
Clovis Goods 20S0301-72, 72 x 36 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)

Clovis Goods 20S0301-72, 72 x 36 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)

  • Specifications:
  • Material: Glass
  • Shape: Rectangle
  • Weight: 49.6 lbs
  • 120VAC, 60Hz, 160W
  • Condition: NEW
  • Dimensions:
  • Width: 72 Inch
  • Thickness: 1 1/4 Inch
  • Height: 36 Inch
  • Features:
  • Modern elegance - Upgrade the functionality of your bathroom and interior with this High-
  • Quality LED Mirror
  • Anti-fog - No need to wipe the steamy mirror after a hot shower any longer; the defogging function provides you with a new fog-free experience for you to start your day conveniently
  • 3 color lighting - 3000k, 4000k, and 6000k (+/- 100) lighting options; tap on the touch sensor to switch to different lights, and press and hold to adjust the brightness of each light individually
  • Easy installation - mounting kit included. A cordless drill or screwdriver and hammer required
  • Safe and durable - Clovis goods mirrors are made of an eco-friendly copper-free corrosion-resistant silver material

Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
